settings.map-address: Sprout Therapy, Portland Street, Dartmouth, NS
settings.heading: See what's in store.
Subscribe to our weekly newsletter for 10% off
Why choose Sprout Therapy for your juicing needs?
settings.text: It’s simple, our juice is cold pressed, unpasteurized and has no added sugars or preservatives meaning you’re getting pure, fresh juice at its finest. Cold pressing, gently extracts the juice from the fruit and vegetables preserving vitamins, minerals and enzymes making it a nutrient dense drink.

settings.heading: Cleansing, good for the body and mind.
settings.text: Juice cleanses are a great way to reset and detoxify the body, as they provide a concentrated dose of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants from fresh fruits and vegetables. Juice cleansing, temporarily eliminates solid foods from your diet, allowing the digestive system to rest. A healthy gut links to a healthy mind. Our cleanses offer multiple different benefits, from a digestion reset, anti-inflammation, or just restoring your body’s natural balance.
